description.en:
In the world where the sea level has risen, the sea has already covered the continent.   
In the world where the land can not be found anymore, the family of the boy, 'Bota', lives in a small boat and wanders around.   
  
I am looking for another 'man' somewhere and I am safe in the rules that my father has set.
description.vi: Trong một thế giới nơi mực nước biển đã dâng cao và đại dương đã bao phủ toàn bộ lục địa, đất liền không còn tồn tại nữa. Gia đình của cậu bé tên Bota sống trên một con thuyền nhỏ và lang thang khắp nơi. Tôi đang tìm kiếm một "người" nào đó ở đâu đó và an toàn trong những quy tắc mà cha tôi đã đặt ra.
description.pt-br: O mundo foi submerso e monstros marinhos governam a terra. Será que Bota e sua família irão conseguir escapar desse inferno marítimo? E quem diabos é Kana...?!

altTitles.ja: 霊と遊ぶな子供たち！！

description.en:
7 scary stories by Inuki Kanako   (4.1 and 4.2 were adapted into a movie, check Gokiburi no Ie's page for more info)

1- Ushirogami: 
2- Psycho Box: 
3- Children, Don't Play with Ghosts!: The mangaka, Kanako Inuki, tells some of her own scary experiences with ghost stories in childhood.
4- Women of the Dark (Kurayami no Onna-tachi)
4.1- Room 1: Woman that Loves Cooking
4.2- Room 2: Women in the Trash Dumping Area
4.3- Room 3: 117th Woman 
5- The House of Cockroaches: A rich woman has a deathly fear of cockroaches which leads to...
6- Nightmare Door: A girl experiences strange and horrifying nightmares.
7- 100 Ghost Stories

altTitles.ja: 7thGARDEN [セブンスガーデン]
セブンスガーデン

description.en:
As a gardener served in a rural manor, Avin wished nothing more than peaceful days along with his lord's daughter, Marie. One day, he accidentally woke up a demon sleeping in a nearby mountain. What she wished was to have him as a servant before felling the heaven and turn this world into her garden. Avin of course declined the offer. However, not long after that, the town Avin staying was suddenly raided by Knights Templar who supposed to protect the country. Avin was then presented with choices: Will he perish along with the garden and his dear ones, or become demon's servant and have this world perish instead…

---

Releases of this series stopped with volume #8 chapter #32 on May 2017.

altTitles.ja: ゴキブリの家

description.en:
3 Stories (part 1 and 3 of chapter 1 and chapter 3) here were adapted into a movie called Bourei no Sumu Ie ~Kanako Inuki Kyoufu WORLD~  (亡霊の棲む家～犬木加奈子恐怖world～)

1. Kurayami no Onnatachi (*暗闇の女たち* Women of the Darkness) 
3 stories about women living normal lives in their apartments, but eventually everything starts going wrong.

2. Gokiburi no Ie (*ゴキブリの家* The House of Cockroaches)
A rich woman that has a terrible fear of cockroaches faces a bizarre cockroach infestation...

3. Kao no nai Onna (*顔のない女* Faceless Woman)
A woman's neighbor starts trying to take her identity and life...

4. Jukai Kitan (*樹海奇譚* Strange Tale of the Sea of Trees)
A man enters the famous Aokigahara forest, known for its suicides, and he finds the corpse of a beautiful woman, and decides to take photos of it...

5. Rei to Asobu na Kodomotachi!! (*霊と遊ぶな 子供たち!!* Children, Don't Play with Ghosts!!
Kanako Inuki tells her own scary stories from childhood.

6. Akumu no Tobira (*悪夢の扉* Door of Nightmares)
A girl is stuck in twisted fairytale-esque nightmares...

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

altTitles.ja: トニカクカワイイ

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

altTitles.vi: Sứa không thể bơi trong đêm

altTitles.en: Jellyfish Can't Swim in the Night

altTitles.ja: 夜のクラゲは泳げない

description.en: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

altTitles.en: Studio Apartment, Good Lighting, Angel Included.

altTitles.ja: ワンルーム、日当たり普通、天使つき。

altTitles.zh: 單間, 光照尚好, 附帶天使

description.en:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven???

Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity? A romantic comedy between two innocent souls.
description.ja: 人暮らしの男子高校生、徳光森太郎。彼が自宅のベランダで出会ったのは清楚で優しい女の子『とわ』。けれど彼女の正体は…？　無垢な二人の胸キュン同居ラブコメディ♪
description.vi: Chúng ta đã quen với câu chuyện về anh nhân viên nhặt được bé JK tại lề đường. Nhưng sẽ ra sao nếu vẫn với chủ đề nhặt được người ấy, cậu học sinh năm nhất cao trung lại nhặt được một thiên thần từ Thiên Đàng ngay trong căn hộ của cậu ta? Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo??
description.pt-br:
O que  aconteceria se você acordasse e visse uma linda garota deitada ao seu lado na cama? Além disso, ela não é uma garota comum, mas sim um Anjo que vem do Céu???

Shintarou Tokamitsu é um estudante do ensino médio que mora sozinho. Um dia, ele encontrou uma linda garota sentada em sua varanda. O nome dela é Towa, mas qual é a sua verdadeira identidade? Uma comédia romântica entre duas almas inocentes.

altTitles.ja: 四季崎姉妹はあばかれたい

altTitles.en: The Shikisaki Sisters Want to be Exposed

description.en: One day, Tarou Yamada, who runs a detective business, slips on a banana peel and reincarnates into Tsukushi Shikisaki, the younger brother of three beautiful big-breasted sisters who will all die on the same day. As he spends time surrounded by the three beautiful sisters, he finds out that the boy he is reincarnated as will be killed by one of the three sisters ...!?
description.ja: 探偵業を営む山田太郎はある日、バナナの皮に足を滑らせてしまい、同日に命を落とした美麗三姉妹の弟・四季崎つくしに転生をしてしまう。美人三姉妹に囲まれて過ごすことになるが、四季崎つくしが三姉妹の誰かに殺されたことに気がついてしまい…!?

title.en: Net no "Oshi" to Real no "Oshi" ga Tonari ni Hikkoshite Kita

altTitles.ja: ネットの『推し』とリアルの『推し』が隣に引っ越してきた

altTitles.en: My Fave Persons Moved into Condominium Where I Live

description.en:
**The only one who can support them is... me?**

Tendou Souma, who spends his days in idle monotony, has two "idols." His online idol is Henrietta, a hugely popular VTuber. His real-life idol is Hiyori Yatsumi, an idol and voice actress. Souma's university life was supposed to be centered around supporting these two idols... But then, one of his idols unexpectedly moves into the room next door!? Excited by this dream-like turn of events, Soma is thrilled, but what he discovers is the disappointing true nature of his idol...
description.ja: 無為な日々を過ごす天童蒼馬には二人の『推し』がいる。ネットの『推し』大人気VTuberのアンリエッタ。リアルの『推し』アイドル声優の八住ひより。二人への推し活を生きがいに大学生活を送るはずが……なんと隣の部屋に『推し』の一人が引っ越してきて!?夢のような展開に胸を躍らせる蒼馬だったが、目の当たりにしたのは残念すぎる『推し』の本性で――。
description.vi: Vtuber nhà rác... Seiyuu Idol bợm rượu... Bạn thuở nhỏ Yandere... Ai sẽ là người chiến thắng

title.en: Hakumei & Mikochi: Tiny Little Life in the Woods

altTitles.ja: ハクメイとミコチ

altTitles.th: ฮาคุเมกับมิโคจิ

altTitles.vi: HAKUMEI VÀ MIKOCHI: CUỘC SỐNG TÍ HON TRONG RỪNG SÂU

description.en:
Nine centimeters (3.5 inches) tall, the tiny girls Hakumei and Mikochi live in the forest. 
Living in a house in a tree, riding insects and birds, and making umbrellas out of leaves, they live a happy and comfortable life. 
Follow their tiny but lovely lives as they live their day to day in a fantastic world of inchlings, animals, and strange happenings.  
  
**#EverydayHeroes Scans Note:**  
Chapter 39 is next after 34. No chapters were skipped, as we switched to using Harta magazine raws, and the chapters from the magazine use a different numbering system.
description.vi: Câu truyện kể về Hakumei và Mikochi. Hai cô gái tộc người lùn chỉ cao có 9 centimeters, sống cùng nhau nơi rừng sâu. Xây nhà trong hốc cây, lấy lá làm dù, cưỡi trên lưng côn trùng và chim chóc để chu du khắp nơi. Cuộc sống của hai cô gái tuy đơn giản nhưng đáng yêu, khi họ được sống trong thế giới tuyệt vời của những người tí hon và thần linh.

altTitles.ja: 死して生きるSSS級ハンター

altTitles.th: นักล่าพลีชีพ ระดับ SSS

description.de:
In dem mysteriösen, einem RPG Dungeon ähnelnden Turm lebt der alle berühmten Hunter beneidende Gong-Ja Kim sein alltägliches Leben.
Eines Tages wird sein Wunsch nach mehr mit einem legendären Skill beantwortet, mit dem er die Fähigkeiten anderer kopieren kann ... auf Kosten seines eigenen Lebens.
Bevor er einen Sinn daraus ziehen kann, wird er vom Rang 1 Hunter, dem Flame Emperor, ermordet!
Das aktiviert aber seinen Skill und nun besitzt er einen neuen, nämlich die Möglichkeit, durch seinen Tod in der Zeit zurückzureisen.
Wie wird Gong-Ja dieses Skills nutzen, um seine Konkurrenz zu überflügeln und die Spitze zu erreichen?
description.en:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
description.id:
Sebuah menara tiba-tiba muncul di dunia. Dari sisi mana pun di bumi, menara tersebut tetap terlihat menembus horizon. Berbagai monster memenuhi tiap lantai yang ada di menara itu. Orang yang masuk dalam menara itu ternyata bisa mendapatkan skill! Semua orang akhirnya berbondong-bondong untuk memburu para monster dan menjadi hunter kelas dunia.

"Tapi aku hanya hunter kelas F yang tidak punya skill apa-apa, aku juga mau skill kelas S! Tunggu..."

CRING!

"Itu... Kartu emas? Akhirnya kemunculan skill-ku datang juga?"

[Skill Level S+]
[BISA MENDUPLIKASI SKILL ORANG YANG MEMBUNUHMU, HANYA TERAKTIVASI KETIKA KAMU MATI]

"Skill ini... Apa gunanya skill semacam ini?!"

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS-Class-Revival-Hunter/46)
description.ja:
Fランクのおちこぼれハンター「孔子」 ランキング１位の「炎帝」を妬む日々を過ごしていた孔子は、ある日「敵のスキルをコピーできる」というS級スキルを手に入れる。 しかし喜びも束の間、このスキル…何かがおかしい！！ なに！？発動条件がオレの死…？最高のハンターを目指す孔子の挑戦が始まる…！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/65543)
description.ko:
F급 말단 헌터 ‘김공자‘.
랭킹 1위 ‘염제‘를 부러워하던 어느 날, 무려 S+급 스킬을 얻는다.
하지만 기쁨도 잠시, 어째 스킬 내용이 이상하다?!
 
상대의 스킬 중 1개를 복사한다,까지는 좋은데…
 
"뭐? 내가 죽어야만 발동된다고?!"
 
죽어야 사는 헌터의 인간찬가 <SSS급 죽어야 사는 헌터>

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/SSS%EA%B8%89-%EC%A3%BD%EC%96%B4%EC%95%BC-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%ED%97%8C%ED%84%B0/2454)
description.th:
เป็นตอนที่ทำให้เสียน้ำตาแบบมากๆตั้งแต่พาเนลที่พระเอกเดินเข้ามาในบ้านยันตอนสุดท้ายที่ปลอบโยนดวงวิญญาณ ไม่ใช่การกำจัดบอสเพราะต้อง"กำจัด"เพียงอย่างเดียว แต่พระเอกตกตระกอนความคิดตอนเห็นเรื่องราวในอดีตได้เลยเลือกที่จะกำจัดโดยใช้วิธีปลอบโยนแทน มันแบบ อือ เหมียนหมา

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%9E_%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A_SSS/98)
description.pt-br:
Eu também quero uma habilidade Rank S! Eu quero tanto que eu poderia morrer por isso!

[Você despertou uma habilidade Rank S.] [Mas só funciona quando você morre.]
Eh !? DO QUE ELA VAI SERVIR SE EU JÁ ESTIVER MORTO!?
description.zh-hk:
身處F級底層的獵人「金孔子」
長久以來一直羨慕著排行第一的獵人「炎帝」。
某天，他竟突然獲得了S+級的技能。
不料，短暫開心過後，
他發現這個技能有些古怪?!

「複製對方的其中一種技能」
到這裡都還不錯...

「什麼?竟然要我死了才能發動?!」

重生獵人的人生樂章——
《SSS級死而復生的獵人》

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/SSS%E7%B4%9A%E6%AD%BB%E8%80%8C%E5%BE%A9%E7%94%9F%E7%9A%84%E7%8D%B5%E4%BA%BA/96)

altTitles.ja: Desutoro 246

description.en: Billionaire Tono Ryuichi, the President of Tono Foods Group, a giant food company, recently acquired two young female assassins from the Mexican cartel. Sui and Ai came from unimaginably poor childhoods and was given a choice between killing people or selling their body. They chose the former and went through an inconceivably extreme training and, at 17 years old, they have become one of the deadliest assassins in the world. They are absolutely obedient to their master and they are given the task of finding the killer that poisoned Ryuichi's wife and child. They begin attending high school to blend into society and, at the same time, read and study which helps them become even more deadlier on the field. Sui and Ai encounter Matoba Imari who is a high school assassin herself and may be more skilled than both of them. But unlike the two, Imari just wants to lead a normal life. Whatever Imari wishes for her life is not their problem because the only thing Sui and Ai feeds on are bloodthirst and a challenge.
description.ja: 青年実業家の透野隆一は南米のマフィアから2人の美少女殺し屋を買い付ける。翠と藍と名付けられた彼女たちは透野の命令で、彼の妻子を殺した人間を狩ることに。だがその道行きで別の殺し屋女子たちと出会い、事態は思わぬ方向へ加速していくのだった…。青年実業家の透野隆一は南米のマフィアから2人の美少女殺し屋を買い付ける。翠と藍と名付けられた彼女たちは透野の命令で、彼の妻子を殺した人間を狩ることに。だがその道行きで別の殺し屋女子たちと出会い、事態は思わぬ方向へ加速していくのだった…。
description.vi: Tono Ryuichi, người đứng đầu Tono Foods Group, sở hữu trong tay một chuỗi các nhà hàng hạng sang đắt tiền tại Nhật Bản. Một ngày nọ, anh quyết định đến Mexico mua cho mình hai cô gái sát thủ trẻ được nuôi dưỡng bởi Mafia, với mục đích tìm cho ra kẻ đã hãm hại vợ và con của mình. Anh đặt tên cho cả hai là Sui (THÚY) và Ai (LAM). Sau khi chuyển đến Tokyo, Sui và Ai được Tono cho theo học tại một trường tư thục, nơi cả hai được thỏa thích đọc sách để nâng cao kiến thức để trau dồi thêm kỹ năng ám sát của mình. Tại đây, họ gặp được Matoba Imari, vốn cũng là sát thủ, thậm chí có phần còn giỏi hơn cả hai. Nhưng không giống họ, Imari chỉ muốn có một cuộc sống bình thường. Dẫu vậy, bất chấp mong muốn của Imari, những gì Sui và Ai quan tâm lại chỉ có mùi tanh của máu và những vụ săn giết thỏa mãn được bản tính ưa thách thức của họ.

description.en:
I've long known about your ill intentions!

Huang Yun'er, a D-lister deliberately gets close to female CEO Ou Chenxi, intending to seduce her in order to gain access to the Ou family and investigate her cousin's death. Ou Chenxi sees through Huang Yun'er's scheming, but believing she can fully control the situation and finding Huang Yun'er aesthetically appealing, she doesn't reject this dangerous woman's advances. At the same time, she wants to investigate Huang Yun'er's motives.

One deliberately seduces but wavers due to love amidst her calculations, while the other is irresistibly attracted despite knowing the danger... These two cunning individuals sink together while fully aware, parrying each other's moves while desperately trying to suppress their growing feelings. As they struggle with their emotions, they gradually uncover secrets from the past.

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士
All Great Achievements Require Time

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!
description.vi: Biệt đội cơ động cảnh sát thời không, hay còn gọi tắt là "Cảnh sát thời gian" (Người tua ngược/Rewinder) là một tổ chức giải cứu những người có cái chết bất đắc kì tử! Họ sử dụng một cỗ máy thời gian ở mắt phải "Retry Eye"! Những cảnh sát thời gian có thể quay ngược thời gian hàng chục, hàng trăm tới hàng nghìn lần cho đến khi phá được vụ án! Bộ truyện từng lập kỷ lục suốt 1 năm liền đứng đầu liên tục trong danh sát truyện yêu thích của tạp chí Corocoro Comic.

title.en: Kodoku no Kochou wa Donna Yume wo Miru no ka?

altTitles.ja: 蠱毒の胡蝶はどんな夢を見るのか？

altTitles.en: What Does the Poisonous Butterfly Dream of?

description.en:
This world has been invaded by bugs.

With the appearance of the "Armored Bugs," mutating insect monsters that can overcome all modern weapons, humanity has been robbed of much of its living space. The only ones who can stand against such adversaries are the "Noble Butterflies," girls who harbor "Insects" that have gone through evolutions differing from the armored bugs.

One of the candidates to become a Noble Butterfly, Odamaki Ayumi, still suffers from the fact that she is unable to become one. Her best friend, who was supposed to be with her and was her object of admiration, has left her and no longer seeks her company.

Those days of despair came to an end when she was on the verge of death in a battle with armored bugs.
"Don't think that I... will die without doing anything!"

With the end near, the girl's body transformed into a butterfly one. And the flapping of her wings will bring about a revolution in the world...!
description.ja: 文明を破壊し人類を蹂躙した突然変異の虫の化身"鎧蟲"。その唯一の対抗策は、鎧蟲とは異なる進化を遂げた"虫"を宿す少女たち、"蝶妃"だけ。万年蝶妃候補生のアユミは劣等生のレッテルを貼られ、絶望の淵に立ちながらも「世界を救う」という使命を胸に日々鍛錬を続ける。しかし努力の先にアユミを待ち受けていたのは、親友の裏切りと耐え難い現実で――。

title.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

altTitles.ja: 世界の果ては深愛

description.en: Fuyuka is a female college student attending an art college in Tokyo, despite her parents' opposition. She feels guilty about leaving her younger brother, who has been supporting her in their strict family home, and running away from home by herself. One day, she is at her wit's end because she can't pay the rent, when her grown-up younger brother, Ameon, appears in front of her...! She is now living together with her brother, whose love is too heavy for her to bear!

title.en: Isekai de Tochi o Katte Noujou o Tsukurou

altTitles.ja: 異世界で土地を買って農場を作ろう

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Tochi wo Katte Noujou wo Tsukurou

altTitles.en: Let’s Buy the Land and Cultivate It in a Different World

description.en:
Corporate drone Itonami Norio is summoned to another world and granted a powerful skill, [Supreme Wielder], which is invisible to those who summoned him. They’re dismayed to see he’s useless to them, so he asks only for a little plot of land to work for himself.

His skill allows him to use any tool to its greatest abilities, including fishing poles, cooking utensils, and construction tools. When he fishes up a mermaid who wants him for her bridegroom, charms a young dragon with his cooking, and excites an undead king with his rare skill, how long can his quiet country life last?!

title.en: Koroshiteyaro to Omotta Aitei ga Dekiai shitekite Komarimasu

altTitles.ja: 殺してやろうと思った相手が溺愛してきて困ります

altTitles.zh-hk: 被想要殺死的對象溺愛著深感困擾

description.en: Mira lived comfortably as a princess of the kingdom of Axia. But one day, Mira is attacked by a neighboring prince, Leon, and dies vowing revenge against him. The next time Mira wakes up, time has rolled back two months before the incident ......? A reincarnated love story full of miscalculations, starting with revenge!

The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)
description.fr:
Elric Melvinger.
L’unique héritier de la prestigieuse famille magique.
Bien qu’il possédait un talent inné, il avait trop de talent, et de ce fait, ne pouvait pas apprendre la magie. Cependant, il a alors reçu une bénédiction laissée par ses ancêtres !

[Manger des démons.]
[Avaler des démons.]
[Boire des démons.]
[Continue d’accumuler des démons en toi, et réalise une nouvelle magie !]

Élève-toi.
Va si haut que personne ne pourra jamais t’atteindre.
description.ko:
"어이, 메피. 여기 언령마법 풀이 좀 써주시죠?"

기묘한 기연으로 한 몸 살이를 하게 된
천재 마법사 엘릭과 원죄의 마왕 메피스토펠레스.

마법 불능 엘릭이 가보 '마도 경식'의 힘을 빌어
메피스토의 흑마법을 뒤집고 그 힘을 흡수해버린
명실상부 갑을 관계!

하지만,
엘릭은 메피스토의 힘을 최대한 흡수해 강해지려 하고
메피스토는 자신의 기운을 최대한 불어넣어 지배하려 하고...
실상은 서로가 갑이자 을일 수밖에 없는 운명.
마도 명문 메르빙거 가의 재건을 꿈꾸는 엘릭과
엘릭의 몸을 지배해 다시금 고귀한 마왕으로 부활하려는 메피스토의
'동상이몽 마족삼킴 어드벤쳐'

"좋게 좋게 가시죠?"
"하찮은 인간 따위에게... 굴복할 것 같으냐!!!"

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

altTitles.ja: ダンス・ダンス・ダンスール

description.en:
Junpei is happily snoozing away during his sister's ballet recital when a male ballet dancer steps onto the stage. Moved by the strength and skills the dancer displays, the boy discovers his love for this art.  
  
But after a certain tragedy happens, he vows to leave his past behind and turn into the epitome of manliness. What will he do when his love for ballet reignites?!

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン Re:Aincrad

description.en: The manga will not only cover the original Aincrad arc, but also various Aincrad side stories, including those that were never animated, such as The First Day/The Day of Beginnings from volume 8 of the novels.
description.ja:
2022年11月、世界中の注目を集める世界初のフルダイブ型VRMMORPG《ソードアート・オンライン》は、サービスを開始した――。しかしそれは、天才科学者・茅場晶彦が仕掛けた、約１万ものプレイヤーたちの命を賭けたデスゲームの始まりであった……！

「これは、ゲームであっても遊びではない――。」

ゲーム内での「死」は、すなわちリアルでの「死」を意味し、ゲームをクリアするまでこの世界からの脱出は不可能。そんな絶望的な状況で、孤高の剣士・キリトはひとり、元ベータテスターであるその知識を活かし、クリアを目指して戦場を駆ける。そして閃光のようにレイピアを操る少女・アスナとの運命的な出会いを果たし――。
description.pt-br: O mangá não cobrirá apenas o arco Aincrad original, mas também várias histórias paralelas de Aincrad, incluindo aquelas que nunca foram animadas, como The First Day / The Day of Beginnings do volume 8 dos romances.

title.en: Mushoku Tensei ~Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu~ Shitsui no Majutsushi-hen

altTitles.ja: 無職転生 ～異世界行ったら本気だす～ 失意の魔術師編

altTitles.zh-hk: 無職轉生 ～到了異世界就拿出真本事～ 失意的魔術師篇

altTitles.en: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation - Depressed Magician

altTitles.ru: Реинкарнация безработного ~История о приключениях в другом мире~ Арка подавленного волшебника

altTitles.en: Jobless Reincarnation ~I'll Try Seriously If I Go To Another World~ Depressed Magician Arc

altTitles.ja-ro: Mushoku Tensei: Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu - Shitsui no Majutsushi-hen
Mushoku Tensei ~Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu~ Shitsui no Majutsushi Hen

description.en:
After separating from Eris, Rudeus falls into the depths of depression. He travels to Rozenberg, the second city of the Principality of Basherant, to search for his missing mother, Zenith. Desperate, Rudeus tries to accept a high-ranking quest alone in order to make a name for himself. However, by chance, he ends up working with a party of B-rank adventurers called the Counter Arrow. One of the party members is a girl named Sara, who reminds him of Eris...!

A complete manga adaptation of the seventh volume of the light novel series, depicting the aftermath of Rudeus' separation from Eris!
description.ja:
エリスと別れ、失意の底に落ちるルーデウス。
行方不明の母ゼニスを捜すため、バシェラント公国、第二都市ローゼンバーグを訪れる。
自暴自棄に陥るルーデウスは、名をあげようと高ランクの依頼を一人きりで受けようとする。
しかし、ひょんなことからＢランク冒険者パーティ『カウンターアロー』と行動を共にすることに。
そのパーティメンバーにはどこかエリスの面影を感じさせるサラという少女がいて…!?

エリスと別れたルーデウスのその後を描く、原作小説７巻を完全コミカライズ!!

altTitles.ja: オトナを知りたい女友達
My Galpals are Cumming of Age

altTitles.en: My Galpal Wants An Adult Understanding
My Girl Friend Wants An Adult Understanding

description.en:
20-year-old Sawatari Tatsurou is a male college student. While others around him are rejoicing in the springtime of their youth, he's enjoying his solitary life to the fullest. He has a noble hobby. Which is… appreciating lewd vide*s. “I don't need a girlfriend. Because I have AVs”. A fulfilling everyday where he continuously releases his male desires with his exceptional AV love…… However one day, his classmate and gal galpal Kaniko Eimi witnesses him cranking it at his place!

Then, she says something shocking to Tatsurou, who thinks the world is ending.

“I-is it fine if I watch the AV together with you……?”

Watch it together with your innocent galpal with an immoral atmosphere! A vid-life story where male desires are laid bare with a gal!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/watch/mg878860)

altTitles.ja: 他校のボーイッシュ彼女

description.en: Daichi and Akira have been childhood friends forever but have only started dating recently. While Akira is very much a tomboy, there are some parts of her that are surprisingly girly?

altTitles.ja: ざーこざこざこざこ先生

altTitles.vi: Sensei Tép Riu Tép Riu Tép Riu Tép Riuu

description.en:
Souichi Kirisaki, who teaches at a private middle school, has a problem. Three of his students, Senka Yuzugami, Yuki Kitsuregawa, and Momoka Watarase, make fun of him. Souichi wants to be well liked, but the girls look down on him and tease him every day. Soichi is troubled, but the truth is that all three of them love Souichi, they just can't be honest with him, plus Momoka is a stalker... A sassy and cute romcom between a teacher and three middle school students!
Note: formerly a two-part Oneshot, it became serialized as of Chapter 3.
description.vi: Souichi Kirisaki, giáo viên ở một trường cấp hai tư thục, chỉ muốn sống thanh liêm và hòa đồng với học sinh. Khổ nỗi là có ba con mắm này lúc này cũng kéo đàn kéo nhóm để pressing ông anh. Trông có vẻ là thế nhưng thực ra cả ba đứa đều đang crush ông main này nhưng khổ lắm đã nghiện rồi mà lại ngại cơ... Điểm danh 3 đứa nhé: Chika Yuzukami (con gái yêu của hiệu trưởng trường với quả ahoge nhìn không khác gì gián), Yuki Kitsuregawa (cô bé Tsundere tóc vàng ngây ther), và Momoka Watarase (con dâm tặc nhất cả nhóm, có thâm niên rình mò quan sát sensei). Để xem là ông thầy và ba con mắm này sẽ có những tình huống dở khóc dở cười (và dở "răm") nào nha!

altTitles.ja: 空をまとって

description.en:
Haro Ogawa, a high school student, is also a self-taught oil painter who is trying to paint the ultimate nude. 
After an unexpected encounter with an elusive "witch", he sets his sights on applying to art school... 
The mystery that resides in the human body, the ultimate "beauty", will be painted on canvas! 
A skin-colored coming-of-age drama!
description.ja: 「俺もいつかこんなヌードを描きたい――」　幼少時に見た絵画、「魔女のヌード」に魅入られた高校生・小川波路（おがわはろ）。日々、独学でヌードを描く彼の前に現れたのは、「魔女のヌード」に描かれた女性に瓜二つの美女、神生伶だった。ハロは思わず、伶にヌードモデルになってほしいと頼みこむが…!?　目指すはヌードで藝大合格!!

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活

description.en:
A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)

---
**Notice:** The chapter numbering of Company and Private Life will be pushed back/changed. Please do not be alarmed with this change. Thank you.
description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

altTitles.ja: ろこぽん

description.en: As far as the public is concerned, Rocopon—earth’s only alien—hasn’t done much but loaf around in the 8 years since he crash-landed in Tokyo with no memory of his past. Granted, that is what he likes to do, and he does spend a lot of time playing video games. But as an alien to whom earth laws technically do not apply, he’s been hard at work in a top-secret capacity: government-sanctioned extrajudicial assassin, cleaning up the worst of society that the law is either too slow or too powerless to confront. After years of dispatching hapless crime lords and their goons, things have gotten comfortable. But Rocopon is about to meet his match in more ways than one—fed up with his sloppy ways, headquarters has assigned him a straight-laced partner, and the criminal underground has enlisted the help of those who are a little more than human… [Kodansha]
description.vi: 8 năm trước, một người ngoài hành tinh đã tới Trái Đất và hiện tại anh ta đã được cấp quyền công dân và được đặt dưới dự quản lý của Bộ Quốc Phòng Nhật Bản. Trông bề ngoài chỉ là một thằng cha vô công rồi nghề nhưng thực tế anh ta hiện đang làm việc cho Bộ Quốc Phòng nhưng làm việc gì thì...

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

altTitles.ja: 女将軍✕兵卒

title.en: Kimi ni Todoke: From Me to You

altTitles.ja: 君に届け

description.en:
Sawako Kuronuma is the perfect heroine… for a horror movie. With her jet-black hair, sinister smile and silent demeanor, she's often mistaken for the haunting movie character Sadako. But behind her scary facade is a very misunderstood teenager. Too shy to fit in, all she wants to do is make some friends. But when a popular boy in class befriends her, she's sure to make more than just that–she's about to make some enemies too!  
  
---
- **Won the 32nd Kodansha Manga Award for Shojo in 2008**

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Kimi ni Todoke: From Me To You** (2014)

title.en: Psycho x Past: Ryouki Satsujin Sennyuu Sousa

altTitles.en: Psycho x Past: Bizarre Murder Undercover Investigation

altTitles.ja: サイコ×パスト 猟奇殺人潜入捜査

altTitles.vi: Psycho X Past: Những Vụ Án Giết Người Kỳ Quái

description.en: Godai, a policeman, who was removed from the investigations division of the police due to violence toward criminals. He teams up with Hidaka, a man who is a self-proclaimed "paranormal police investigator" with claims to have the ability to send Godai in the past to prevent all the horrific crimes that happened, is that even possible and what will be the consequences?
description.ja: 犯人への過剰暴力が原因で左遷させられた熱血刑事の五代。新たな上司は自称“超能力捜査官”の飛高警視正。赴任早々、五代はとある連続殺人事件へと潜入捜査を命じられるのだが…!?

title.en: The Lazy Lord Masters the Sword

altTitles.en: The Lazy Prince Becomes a Genius

altTitles.ru: От нерадивого аристократа до усердного гения

altTitles.ja: 怠惰公子、努力の天才になる

description.en:
After witnessing the shocking death of his mother, young Airen Farreira uses sleep to escape his painful reality, earning him the nickname, “the lazy lord”. Yet, in spite of others’ jeers and whispers, Airen has no intention of changing his ways.

But when he awakens one day from a dream about a mysterious swordsman, his life’s trajectory takes a complete turn...

---
- [Alternative English Translation (Tappytoon)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-lazy-lord-masters-the-sword)
description.fr: Irene Perreira est un garçon qui dort pour s’enfuir de la réalité. Les gens se moquent de lui, en l’appelant 'bon à rien' , mais il n'a aucune envie de changer. Jusqu'à ce qu'un jour, il rêva d'un épéiste... C'était un rêve d'un homme sans talent qui a entraîné ses mouvements à l'épée pendant des décennies.
description.ja: 誰も期待していなかった一族の怠け者、アイルーンパレイラがついに剣を手に取る。
description.ko:
잠을 도피처로 삼아 온 소년 아이른 파레이라.
사람들은 그를 나태 공자라 부르며 조롱했지만 그는 변할 생각이 없었다.
어느 날 어느 검사의 꿈을 꾸기 전까지는...
그것은 그저 묵묵히 수십 년간 검을 휘두르며 단련하는 한 재능 없는 사내에 관한 꿈이었다.
description.ru:
Юный Айрон Парейра сделал свой мир грёз убежищем от боли трагедии прошлого. Людей забавляло это, они подняли его на смех и прозвали нерадивым аристократом. Однако подобное отношение никак не задевало нашего героя необходимостью меняться.
Так бы всё и продолжалось, не повстречай он во сне бездарного юношу, который тридцать семь лет подряд обучался владению мечом, да так и умер с оружием в руках.
description.pt-br: Irene Pareyra é um rapaz que dormia para fugir da realidade. As pessoas o zoavam, chamavam de preguiçoso, mas ele não tinha a intenção de mudar. Até que um dia ele sonhou com um espadachim… Foi um sonho sobre um homem sem talento que treinou por décadas brandindo sua espada.
description.zh-hk: 家族中的懶惰蟲終於拿起了劍！將睡覺視為逃避方法的少年艾倫．帕雷拉，即使人們都嘲笑他為懶惰公子，他依然不願改變，直到有天他夢見了一位數十年間不斷揮劍鍛練的無才男子...

altTitles.ja: はらぺこ母娘と元カレ家主

altTitles.ja-ro: Hara peko Oyako to Motokare Yanushi

altTitles.en: A Hungry Mother and Daughter and Her Ex-Boyfriend Landlord

altTitles.pt-br: Uma mãe faminta, sua filha e seu ex-namorado proprietário

description.en:
36-year-old Takaharu lives alone. After graduating from Art College, he has been living a quiet life while painting pictures. 

One day, his ex-girlfriend Kyou, whom he broke up with 17 years ago, comes to him with her daughter Minori and asks him to let them stay at his place. As in their college days, 

Kyou is attracted by the delicious food, and so the three of them begin to live together!
description.ja: 36歳のたかはるは一人暮らし。美大を卒業後、ほそぼそと絵を描いて暮らしていた。そんなある日、17年前に別れた元カノ・キョウが娘のみのりを連れてやってきて「居候をさせて欲しい」という。大学時代同様においしい食べ物につられたキョウにほだされ、三人での生活が始まるが……？
description.pt-br: Takaharu, de 36 anos, mora sozinho. Depois de se formar na Art College, ele vive uma vida tranquila enquanto pinta quadros. Um dia, sua ex-namorada Kyou, com quem ele terminou há 17 anos, vem até ele com sua filha Minori e pede que ele as deixe ficar em sua casa. Assim como nos tempos de faculdade, Kyou se sente atraída pela comida deliciosa, e assim os três passam a morar juntos.

altTitles.en: I Will Not Succumb to Love

altTitles.ja: 愛になんて溺れない

altTitles.en: I Won't Fall in Love Again

description.en: The story centers on Rei, a woman who dislikes unreasonable things. When she begins working at a human resources consulting company, she meets Ninomiya, a man whom Rei acknowledges has skill, but only makes arguments from logic without concern for someone else's feelings. (ANN)
description.es: Rei, una mujer que odia las cosas irrazonables. Cuando comienza a trabajar en recursos humanos, conoce a Kyoka, su superior, quien es brillante pero nada trabajador.
description.pt-br: Rei é uma mulher que detesta coisas irracionais. Quando ela começa a trabalhar na parte de recursos humanos de uma empresa de consultoria, ela acaba conhecendo Kyoya, seu superior e alguém que é brilhante porém sem valor algum.

title.en: Danjo no Yujou wa Seiritsu suru? (Iya, Shinai!!)

altTitles.ja: 男女の友情は成立する？（いや、しないっ！！）

altTitles.en: Can a Boy and Girl Friendship Hold Up? (No It Can't)

altTitles.zh: 男女之间真的存在友情吗

description.en:
At a rural junior high school, a man and a woman vowed an eternal friendship. The relationship between the two who became a fateful community toward one dream-two years have passed without any particular progress ...!

　Yuu Natsume, a flower-loving plant boy, and Inuzuka Himari, a girl who hasn't been in love for the first time yet, have been peacefully close friends in the gardening club with only two of them.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54842)
description.ja: 未だに初恋がこない陽キャ女子・犬塚日葵と、花を愛する植物系男子・夏目悠宇はふとしたきっかけで友情に落ちた。 それから２年――相変わらず『親友』をやっているふたりだったが、悠宇がかつての初恋相手と再会したことで日葵と悠宇の関係も変わり出し……？

description.en:
Shoto Kazama, a boy who has never been able to win at card games because of his habit of giving up on things easily, enters the immersive world of Digimon Liberator through the invitation of his childhood friend, Arisa Kinosaki.

The game allows players to engage in highly realistic card battles. At first, Shoto is hesitant towards it, but through his engrossing encounters with the Digimon there, he becomes a fan of the game.

Encounters with wild Digimon such as Pteromon and battles with NPCs who have gone rogue. These various happenings set the wheels of fate in motion for Shoto and his companions.

This is a story about Digimon, and the world.
description.ja:
諦め癖がついて中々カードバトルに勝てない少年・風真照人は、幼馴染みの城之崎有紗の誘いでフルダイブゲーム〝デジモンリベレイター〟の世界へと足を踏み入れた。

メタバース空間・ラクーナで臨場感溢れるカードバトルを楽しむことが出来るリベレイター。このゲームに最初は抵抗があった照人だったが、リアルなデジモンとの触れ合いを通じて次第に夢中になっていく。

そして、野生のデジモン・プテロモン達との出会い。暴走するNPCとのバトル。様々な出会いが、照人達の運命の歯車を大きく動かしていく。

これは〝デジモン〟と〝世界〟を巡る物語だ。

altTitles.ja: 負けポケモンが多いすぎ！

altTitles.vi: Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc Trong Vũ Trụ Pokemon

description.en: A comic about the daily life of dungeon boys. Slaying the city, saving the dragons... or something like that.
description.pl: Komiks o codziennym życiu chłopców z lochów. Zabijanie miast, ratowanie smoków... czy jakoś tak.

title.en: Only I Know the World Is Ending and Getting Killed by Rampaging Beasts Only Makes Me Stronger

altTitles.ja: この世界がいずれ滅ぶことを、俺だけが知っている　～モンスターが現れた世界で、死に戻りレベルアップ～

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Sekai ga Izure Horobu Koto o, Ore dake ga Shitteiru ~Monster ga Arawareta Sekai de, Shi ni Modori Level Up~

altTitles.en: Only I Know That the World Will End ~ In a World Where Monsters Appear, I Level Up by Returning From Death

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Sekai ga Izure Horobu Koto wo, Ore dake ga Shitte Iru

description.en: Akira Ichijo is your average, run-of-the-mill businessman. One day, on his way home from work, he is suddenly attacked by a Minotaur and killed on the spot. But in the blink of an eye... he wakes up back at the office! When monsters invade into the real world, a cruel reality sets in as the world as we know it plummets into destruction and death. But with the unique skill [Resurrection], Akira can come back to life every time he dies, all the while inheriting the same levels and skills from his last run at life! With unlimited chances to correct his past mistakes, it's up to Akira to utilize the skill he's given and survive this terrifying world with his childhood friend, Nao Nanase.
description.ja: 「異世界が現代に来ちゃダメだろ…」25歳のサラリーマン・一条 明は会社からの帰り道に異世界モンスターのミノタウロスに襲われ死んだ。――かのように思われた次の瞬間、彼は会社で目を覚ました！　明はレベルやステータスを引き継ぎ、死から復活する固有スキル“黄泉がえり”の持ち主だったのだ!!　異世界の侵略に抗え！　「死に戻り＆レベルアップ」のサバイバル！

description.en:
Gamin Yoon, a 17 year old student, goes to a school known to harbor future criminals. Stuck in a carnivorous environment where only the strongest survive, he struggles to get good grades to enter a 4 year university. But, will he be able to study well enough to enter university, or will he get involved in the unending fights around the school?  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/pizixueba/list?title_no=1467)

title.en: Houkago, Family Restaurant de, Class no Ano Ko to

altTitles.vi: Sau giờ học, tại nhà hàng gia đình, cùng cô bạn cùng lớp

altTitles.ja: 放課後、ファミレスで、クラスのあの子と。

altTitles.en: After School, at a Family Restaurant at Night, With That Girl From My Class

altTitles.pt-br: Depois da escola, em um restaurante familiar à noite, com aquela garota da minha turma

altTitles.id: Setelah Sekolah, di Restoran Keluarga Malam Hari, Bersama Cewek Teman Sekelasku

description.en:
It's kind of fun, and I'm comfortable with that kind of time.

The family restaurant after school is the only place where I can feel at ease, as I have no place at home due to my parents' remarriage.
At the family restaurant, I meet a classmate, Kazemiya Kohaku, who is a solitary beautiful girl who doesn't fit in with anyone.
She also seems to be having problems with her family.

From that day on, the boring time at the family restaurant became an enjoyable time to complain with Kohaku.
At the family restaurant after school, the two of them begin their search for a reason not to return home again today...
description.ja:
なんとなく楽しい、そんな時間が心地よくて。

放課後のファミレス、そこは親の再婚で家に居場所がない俺にとって、唯一気が休まる大切な居場所。
そんなファミレスで出会ったクラスメイトの加瀬宮小白は、誰とも馴染まない孤高の美少女。
聞けば彼女も家族との問題を抱えているらしい。

その日から、退屈だったファミレスでの時間は小白と愚痴り合う楽しい時間になった。
放課後のファミレスで、今日もふたりの帰らない理…
description.pt-br: É divertido e me sinto confortável com esse tipo de tempo. O restaurante familiar depois da escola é o único lugar onde posso me sentir à vontade, pois não tenho lugar em casa devido ao novo casamento dos meus pais. No restaurante da família, conheço uma colega de classe, Kazemiya Kohaku, que é uma linda garota solitária que não se dá bem com ninguém. Ela também parece estar tendo problemas com sua família. Daquele dia em diante, o tempo chato no restaurante da família tornou-se um momento agradável para reclamar com Kohaku. No restaurante da família, depois da escola, os dois começam a procurar um motivo para não voltarem para casa hoje...

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン
災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server.
Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!

altTitles.ja: 恋喰少女

description.en: High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women. Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again. However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five!
description.ja:
本物の恋心を、あなたは見抜けるか。

女性を恐れる男子高校生・大石饗。彼に突然告白してきた、5人の少女。そのうち4人は、人間の恋愛感情を喰らう生物「恋喰（こいばみ）」。彼女たちに恋愛感情を食べられると、二度と恋をすることができなくなってしまう。ただ、本当の告白をした1人の気持ちを、見捨てるわけにはいかない――饗は覚悟を決め、5人の中から、本命の1人を見つけだすことを決意する！
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

altTitles.ja: マジメサキュバス柊さん

description.en: The strait-laced Kusakabe found out that his prim OL neighbor Hiiragi-san is actually a succubus! She didn't want to do anything criminal, so she got a normal job to earn money for a place to live and make a living first. Now she's ready to properly suck a man dry! Will Kusakabe be able to resist Hiiragi-san's supernatural charm?

altTitles.en: Doomsday for All: Me, Virus Monarch

description.en: The world is plunged into doomsday. The entire doomsday world has turned into a cruel evolutionary game! This is the greatest opportunity and trial ground for mankind, and it is also the amusement park of gods and demons! Chen Bai was reborn and returned
description.zh: 全球陷入末日笼罩。 整个末日世界，变成了一场残酷的进化游戏！ 这是人类最大的机缘与试炼场，也是神魔的游乐园！ 陈白重生回到了末日开始的十天前！ 直接注射丧尸病毒， 觉醒SSS天赋：病毒君王！ 掌控病毒开始一条与众不同的进化之路！

altTitles.ja: 100万ウォンのロマンス

description.en: "Will this make you happy?" Namwoo wakes up one night to find bills sprawled all over his room - along with the hazy memory of a handsome stranger. Even in his wildest dreams, all Namwoo wants is to have enough money to survive each month. Si-eon, on the other hand, has everything he could ever want except happiness. Intrigued by Namwoo's humble wishes, Si-eon offers him the money he wants - the catch being, he has to date him.
description.ja: - [Official Japanese Translation](https://www.lezhin.com/ja/comic/moneyromance)

title.en: Mizu Mahou Gurai Shika Torie ga Nai Kedo Gendai Chishiki ga Areba Juubun da yo ne?

altTitles.ja: 水魔法ぐらいしか取り柄がないけど現代知識があれば充分だよね？

altTitles.ja-ro: Mizu Mahō Gurai Shika Torie ga Nai Kedo Gendai Chishiki ga Areba Jūbun da yo ne?

altTitles.en: Even if My Only Strength Is Water Magic, Having Modern Knowledge Should Be Sufficient, Right?
Water Magic Is My Only Saving Grace, but Having Modern Knowledge Is Enough, Right?

description.en:
Frim, a 5-year-old orphan living in the streets of the slums district, was a Japanese person in her past life.

Her everyday life was filled with violence and injustice, and she had no one she could count on for help. What she had is "Magic That Can Produce Water" and "Modern Knowledge", that was it. Even hoping for a roof to sleep under was a luxury under such circumstances.

But the world was lacking in ideas about improving working conditions, and by coming up with new ways to use Water Magic aside from producing drinking water, Frim gradually makes a name for herself!

(Source: Comic-Walker)
description.ja:
スラムの路上で生きる5歳の孤児フリムは、日本人だった前世を思い出した。
暴力と理不尽だらけの日常、味方は誰もいない。あるのは「水が出せる魔法」と「現代知識」だけ。
屋根がある寝床を求めるのも贅沢な状況だった……。

しかし、この世界にはないアイデアで職場環境を改善したり、飲用水以外の水魔法の活用方法を見出して、フリムは徐々に存在感を…

title.en: The Role of the Femme Fatale

altTitles.ja: 魔性の乙女の役廻り

description.en:
Kairan Girls’ Academy.

A boarding school rich with history and tradition, attended only by orphans. 

It has a special system in which students are given “roles” that align with their individual goals.

Hanako Shimura, a kind-hearted girl filled with dreams and expectations, enrolls into the academy hoping to make friends with everyone at school. But will she be able to?

A new series by Sasuke, author of False Marigold and Be Careful, Onee-san.!
description.ja:
私立廻蘭女学院中学校。
そこは孤児院出身の子どもたちのみが通う、歴史と伝統ある寄宿学校。
この学校には古くから、生徒たちが個々の目標に沿った【役柄】を与えられるという特殊な制度があった。
心優しい少女・志村花子は「学校中のみんなと友達になる」ことを目標に、夢と期待に胸をふくらませ学校へ入学するが――？

「気をつけなよ、お姉さん。」「偽りのマリィゴールド」のサスケ最新作!!
